about_the_game:
There's a lot going on in Vale of Myth. Are you stuck on a puzzle? Stumped by a boss? Shut down by a quest? Scratching your head at a change in the game world? This guide's got you covered. Coming directly from the developer, this guide contains a complete and illustrated walk-through, detailed information on all puzzles and bosses, a complete quest guide, and information on all the World Events - events in game that change parts of the game world. You might be surprised how much things interconnect!

As a player, this guide gives you the freedom to play without risking locking out any content, and the knowledge of the entirety of the secrets Vale of Myth has to offer. That's why it's coming out late - to give aspiring adventurers the chance to forge their own paths before the great mysteries of the game are divulged!

You might be surprised how much things interconnect!

As a player, this guide gives you the freedom to play without risking locking out any content, and the knowledge of the entirety of the secrets Vale of Myth has to offer. That's why it's coming out late - to give aspiring adventurers the chance to forge their own paths before the great mysteries of the game are divulged!
